snippet.textDisplay: @SuperSonicFan172  In a world where a comment like yours is considered to be "rude", the bullies are as mean as a gang of Yoshis. There is nothing rude about it. Sometimes it seems that every comment to a YouTube video that is not "I totally love this" or "XYZ people are [semi-funny reference to the subject at hand]" (in reference to people who give thumbs down) is considered bad. As long as people do not cross the line they should not be bullied (...) by the morality police, in this case our good and dear Loveness McFarrin. And to get back on topic: You are absolutely right about the ear bleeding. Most of the soundtrack is great, though. Agh, your comments are five months old, why do I even bother... :)
snippet.textOriginal: @SuperSonicFan172  In a world where a comment like yours is considered to be "rude", the bullies are as mean as a gang of Yoshis. There is nothing rude about it. Sometimes it seems that every comment to a YouTube video that is not "I totally love this" or "XYZ people are [semi-funny reference to the subject at hand]" (in reference to people who give thumbs down) is considered bad. As long as people do not cross the line they should not be bullied (...) by the morality police, in this case our good and dear Loveness McFarrin. And to get back on topic: You are absolutely right about the ear bleeding. Most of the soundtrack is great, though. Agh, your comments are five months old, why do I even bother... :)

snippet.textDisplay: @ComposerKuandohan Fair enough.  I can't say I've given up yet, but I can't say I've done much to further it along either.  Thanks for the words, though.

snippet.textDisplay:
@Alexx1083 
But it is. :D
When you know your true passion, everyday is beautiful, even more beautiful than this music.
You'll know when you find it. Yasunori Mitsuda did, and he never let go.
Never give up! There's a reason why that's a cliché. :D
snippet.textOriginal:
@Alexx1083 
But it is. :D
When you know your true passion, everyday is beautiful, even more beautiful than this music.
You'll know when you find it. Yasunori Mitsuda did, and he never let go.
Never give up! There's a reason why that's a cliché. :D

snippet.textDisplay: I actually can't stand this song. I don't know why, either. The rest of CT's soundtrack, is absolute A+. But whenever this song would play when I was a kid playing the game, I would mute the TV. Wish I knew why I didn't like it. :(
snippet.textOriginal: I actually can't stand this song. I don't know why, either. The rest of CT's soundtrack, is absolute A+. But whenever this song would play when I was a kid playing the game, I would mute the TV. Wish I knew why I didn't like it. :(

snippet.textDisplay:
@Lazera Haha. Hey, it's fine. I do that all the time. 

I'm a huge fan of time travel, me being a fan of Doctor Who only proves that. I think, it was this game that got me into the whole theory of traveling through time; especially at such an early age. This game never gets old for me.
snippet.textOriginal:
@Lazera Haha. Hey, it's fine. I do that all the time. 

I'm a huge fan of time travel, me being a fan of Doctor Who only proves that. I think, it was this game that got me into the whole theory of traveling through time; especially at such an early age. This game never gets old for me.

snippet.textDisplay: You know what's funny?  For Best VGM you practically put this entire game's soundtrack on.  Now THAT is a testament to how much musical ass this game kicks.  If your orgasm dies down enough that you can actually get around to playing the game, your head will explode simply because the gameplay is even better!  For those that haven't played Chrono Trigger, yes...yes it is possible for this game to get even better.  Do yourselves a favor and play it!
snippet.textOriginal: You know what's funny?  For Best VGM you practically put this entire game's soundtrack on.  Now THAT is a testament to how much musical ass this game kicks.  If your orgasm dies down enough that you can actually get around to playing the game, your head will explode simply because the gameplay is even better!  For those that haven't played Chrono Trigger, yes...yes it is possible for this game to get even better.  Do yourselves a favor and play it!
